algorithm_technique: In-place string manipulation and grouping with careful index management
problem_summary_simple: Reformat a phone number into blocks of 3 digits, with special handling for the last 2 or 4 digits.
problem_summary_technical: Cleans the number, then reformats it in-place by inserting dashes based on block lengths (3s, then 2s or 3s, then 2s).
key_insights: The core logic involves processing digits and inserting dashes at specific intervals.
Handling the final block of 2 or 4 digits requires careful conditional logic.
An in-place modification approach can be efficient by resizing the list and managing indices carefully.
